answers.answer: They told me my baby is measuring big too but they will check me again at 37w. I went at 33w n he weighed 5lbs. Im 35w now but im not worried. Im a ftm but for some reason i knew this boy would b big
I was also told my belly was tooo big for my dates @33w, even thought i'd go into labor early. But now @ 38w5d still pregnant n hv appt on tuesday.

question: At 31weeks we went for a 4D scan and baby was already weighing 4pound 8oz. Im supposed to be 33weeks but im measuring 37-38. Im being sent for a growth scan today. I dont have diabetes etc so is my baby too big? Has this happened to anyone else? Please help, im worried. X
title: 33w measuring 37-38weeks, baby too big?
